content.text: Those uses permitted in the Residence B District.

No building or structure shall be erected on any lot within the Residence
D District that has less than:
One hundred feet of street frontage.

One hundred feet of lot width at any point from the front property
line to a depth of 40 feet from the front property line.
Fifteen thousand square feet of lot area.

Notwithstanding any contrary provision contained in this section,
a building or structure may be erected on a lot having not less than
60 feet of street frontage, provided that said street frontage coincides
with the circumference of a turnaround at the extremity of a dead-end
street or cul-de-sac.

There shall be front, rear and side yards on each
plot of not less than the following depth or width:
Front yard: 40 feet.
Rear yard: 35 feet.

Side yard: 10 feet, provided that the sum of the two
side yards shall not be less than 25 feet.

On corner plots, a front yard of at least 40 feet
shall be required on each street.

Height restrictions. No building erected in the Residence D District
shall exceed 2 1/2 stories, or 28 feet in height measured from
the average ground level at the perimeter of such building.

Lot coverage. The building area shall not exceed 20% of the first
15,000 square feet of lot area, and 12.5% of that portion of the lot
area, if any, in excess of 15,000 square feet.
The floor area ratio shall not exceed 0.35.

Minimum floor area. Each dwelling shall have a minimum ground floor
area of 1,000 square feet.

Space for the off-street parking of at least
one car for each dwelling shall be provided on the plot.

paras.title: Detached garages, accessory buildings and structures.

content.text:
Each detached garage, accessory building and structure, unless expressly
provided to the contrary elsewhere in this chapter, shall be located
at least three feet from the rear property line and each side property
line, and at least five feet from the primary building on the lot.

No detached garage, accessory building or structure shall exceed
12 feet in height measured from the average ground level at the perimeter
thereof.

No detached garage, accessory building or structure shall occupy
more than 500 square feet of lot area.

Each detached garage, accessory building and structure shall be located
at least 70 feet from any street line; provided, however, that with
respect to any corner lot, any accessory building, structure or detached
garage shall be located only in the corner of the lot farthest removed
from the abutting streets, at least three feet from the two nearest
property lines, and so that the two nearest property lines do not
abut any street.
No lot may contain more than one detached garage.
